publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4583 Malcolm Chisholm: The Draft Automated Registration of Title to Land (Electronic Communications) (Scotland) Order 2006—That the Communities Committee recommends that the draft Automated Registration of Title to Land (Electronic Communications) (Scotland) Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: Johann Lamont*

S2M-4583 Malcolm Chisholm: The Draft Automated Registration of Title to Land (Electronic Communications) (Scotland) Order 2006—That the Communities Committee recommends that the draft Automated Registration of Title to Land (Electronic Communications) (Scotland) Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: Johann Lamont
